manzils.text: khaaaf! bahuth badi shaan waale is Qur’aan ki qasam hai
balke unhe ta’ajjub maloom hoa ke un ke paas un hee mein se ek agaah karne waala aya, to kaafiro ne kaha ke ye ek ajeeb cheez hai
kya jab hum mar kar mitthi ho jayenge, phir ye waapsi door (az aqal) hai
zameen jo kuch un mein se ghataati hai, wo hamein maloom hai aur hamaare paas sab yaad rakhne waali kitaab hai
balke unhone sacchi baath ko jhoot kaha hai, jab ke wo un ke paas pahonch chuki, pas wo ek uljhaao mein pad gaye hai
kya unhone asmaan ko apne upar nahi dekha? ke hum ne ose kis tarah banaya hai aur zeenath di hai, us mein koyi shigaaf nahi
aur zameen ko hum ne bicha diya hai aur us mein hum ne pahaad daal diye hai aur us mein hum ne qism qism ki khush numa cheeze uga di hai
ta ke har rujo karne waale bandhe ke liye binaayi aur danaayi ka zarya ho
aur hum ne asmaan se ba barkath paani barsaaya aur us se baghaath aur katne waale kheth ke ghalle paida kiye
aur khajuro ke bulandh wa baala daraqth jin ke khoshe tay ba tay hai
bandho ki rozi ke liye aur hum ne paani se murda shahar ko zinda kar diya, isi tarah (qabro se) nikalna hai
un se pehle Nuh(alaihissalaam) ki khaum ne aur ras waalo ne aur samoodh ne
aur aadh ne aur feraun ne aur bradaraan looth ne
aur ayika waalo ne aur tubba ki khaum ne bhi takzeeb ki thi, sab ne paighambaro ko jhutlaaya, pas mera waadaye azaab un par saadiq aa gaya
kya hum pehli baar ke payda karne se thak gaye, balke ye log nayi paydayish ki taraf se shak mein hai
hum ne insaan ko payda kiya hai aur us ke dil mein jo qayalaath uthte hai, un se hum waaqif hai aur hum us ki rag jaan se bhi zyaada us se qareeb hai
jis waqth do lene waale ja lete hai, ek daayi taraf aur ek baayi taraf baitha hoa hai
(insaan) mu se koyi lafz nikaal nahi paate magar ke us ke paas nigeh baan tayyaar hai
aur mauth ki be hooshi haq le kar aa pahonchi, yahi hai jis se, tu bidakta phirta tha
aur soor phonk diya jayega, waadaye azaab ka din yahi hai
aur har shaqs is tarah aayega ke us ke saath ek laane waala hoga aur ek gawaahi dene waala
yaqinan to us se ghaflath mein tha lekin hum ne tere saamne se parda hata diya, pas aaj teri nigaah bahuth tez hai
us ka hum nasheen(farishta) kahega ye haazir hai jo ke mere paas tha
daal do jahannam mein har kaafir sar kash ko
jo nek kaam se rokne waale, hadh se guzar jaane waala aur shak karne waala tha
jis ne Allah ke saath dosra maboodh bana liya tha, pas ose saqth azaab mein daal do
us ka hum nasheen (shaytaan) kahega, aye hamaare rab! main ne ise gumraah nahi kiya tha, balke ye khud hee door daraaz ki gumraahi mein tha
haq ta’ala farmayega, bas mere saamne jhagde ki baath math karo, main to pehle hee tumhaari taraf wayeedh (waada azaab) bhej chuka tha
mere haan baath badalti nahi aur na main apne bandho par zara bhi zulm karne wala hoon
jis din hum dozakh se pochenge kya tu bhar chuki? wo jawaab degi kya kuch aur zyaada bhi hai
aur jannath parhezgaaro ke liye bilkul qareeb kardi jayegi, zara bhi door na hogi
ye hai jis ka tum se waada kiya jaata tha, har us shaqs ke liye jo ruju karne waala aur pa-bandhi karne waala ho
jo rahmaan ka ghaybaana khauf rakhta ho, aur tawajje waala dil laaya ho
tum is jannath mein salaamti ke saath daakhil ho jaao, ye hamesha rehne ka din hai
ye wahaa jo chaahe unhe milega (balke) hamaare paas aur bhi zyaada hai
aur un se pehle bhi hum bahuth si ummato ko halaak kar chuke hai, jo un se taaqath mein bahuth zyaada thi, wo shahro mein dhoondte hee reh gaye, ke koyi bhaagne ka thikaana hai
is mein har saahebe dil ke liye ibrath hai aur us ke liye jo dil se mutawajjeh ho kar kaan lagaaye aur wo haazir ho
yaqinan hum ne asmaano aur zameen aur jo kuch us ke darmiyaan hai, sab ko (sirf) che din mein payda kar diya aur hamein thakaan ne chua tak nahi
pas ye jo kuch kehte hai, aap us par sabr kare aur apne rab ki tasbih tareef ke saath bayaan kare, suraj nikalne se pehle bhi aur suraj ghuroob hone se pehle bhi
aur raath ke kisi waqth bhi tasbih kare aur namaaz ke baadh bhi
aur sun rakhe ke jis din ek pukaarne waala qareeb hee ki jageh se pukaarega
jis roz us tandh wa tez cheeq ko yaqeen ke saath sun lenge, ye din hoga nikalne ka
hum hee jilaate hai aur hum hee maarte hai aur hamaari hee taraf laut phir kar ana hai
jis din zameen phat jayegi aur ye daudte hoye (nikal padenge), ye jama kar lena hum par bahuth hee asaan hai
ye jo kuch keh rahe hai, hum ba-qoobi jaante hai aur aap un par jabar karne waale nahi, to aap Qur’aan ke zariye unhe samjhaate rahe, jo mere wayeedh (daraawe ke waado) se darte hai
qasam hai bhikerne waaliyo ki uda kar
phir uthaane waaliya bojh ko
phir chalne waaliya narmi se
phir kaam ko taqseem karne waaliya
yaqeen maano ke tum se jo waade kiye jaate hai (sab) sacche hai
aur beshak insaaf hone waala hai
qasam hai raaho waale asmaan ki
yaqinan tum muqtalif baath mein pade hoye ho
us se wahi baaz rakha jaata hai jo pher diya gaya ho
be’sanadh batein karne waale ghaarath kar diye gaye
jo ghaflath mein hai aur bhole hoye hai
pochte hai ke yaume jaza kab hoga
haan ye wo din hai ke ye aag par tapaaye jayenge
apni fitna pardaazi ka maza chako, yahi hai jis ki tum jaldi macha rahe thein
beshak taqwa waale log bahishto aur chashmo mein honge
un ke rab ne jo kuch unhe ata farmaya hai, ose le rahe honge, wo to us se pehle hee neko kaar thein
wo raath ko bahuth kam soya karte thein
aur waqte sahar esteghfaar kiya karte thein
aur un ke maal mein maangne waalo ka aur sawaal se bachne waalo ka haq tha
aur yaqeen waalo ke liye to zameen mein bahuth si nishaaniya hai
aur khud tumhaari zaath mein bhi, to kya tum dekhte nahi ho
aur tumhaari rozi aur jo tum se waada kiya jaata hai, sab asmaan mein hai
asmaan wa zameen ke parvardigaar ki qasam! ke ye bilkul bar haq hai, aisa hee jaise ke tum batein karte ho
kya tujhe Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ke mauzzaz mehmaano ki qabar bhi pahonchi hai
wo jab un ke haan aaye to salaam kiya, Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ne jawaabe salaam diya (aur kaha ye to) ajnabi log hai
phir (chup chaap jaldi jaldi) apne ghar waalo ki taraf gaye aur ek farba bachde (ka goshth) laaye
aur ose un ke paas rakha aur kaha aap khaate kyo nahi
phir to dil hee dil mein un se khauf zada ho gaye, unhone kaha aap khauf na ki jiye aur unhone us (hazrath Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ko ek ilm waale ladke ki bashaarath di
pas un ki biwi aage badi aur hayrath mein aa kar apne mu par haath maar kar kaha ke main to budhiya hoon aur saath hee baanjh
unhone kaha haan tere parvardigaar ne isi tarah farmaaya hai, beshak wo hakeem aur aleem hai
hazrath Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ne kaha ke Allah ke bheje hoye (farishto) tumhaara kya maqsadh hai
unhone jawaab diya ke hum gunehgaar khaum ki taraf bheje gaye hai
ta ke hum un par mitthi ke kankar barsaaye
jo tere rab ki taraf se nishaan zada hai, un hadh se guzar jaane waalo ke liye
pas jitne imaan waale wahaa thein, hum ne unhe nikaal liya
aur hum ne wahaa musalmaano ka sirf ek hee ghar paaya
aur wahaa hum ne un ke liye jo dardnaak azaab ka dar rakhte hai ek (kaamil) alaamath chohdi
Mosa(alaihissalaam) ke qisse mein (bhi hamaari taraf se tambi hai) ke hum ne ose feraun ki taraf kholi daleel de kar bheja
pas us ne apne bal bothe par mu moda aur kehne laga ye jaadugar hai ya deewana hai
bil aaqir hum ne ose aur us ke lashkaro ko apne azaab mein pakad kar darya mein daal diya, wo tha hee malaamath ke qaabil
isi tarah aadiyo me bhi (hamaari taraf se tambi hai) jab ke hum ne un par khair wa barkath se khaali aandhi bheji
wo jis jis cheez par girti thi, ose bosidha haddi ki tarah (chora chora) kar deti thi
aur samoodh (ke qisse) mein bhi (ibrath) hai jab un se kaha gaya ke tum kuch dino tak fayeda utha lo
lekin unhone apne rab ke hukm se sartaabi ki, jis par un ke dekhte dekhte (tez wa tundh) kadaake ne halaak kar diya
pas na to wo khade ho sa ke aur na badhla le sa ke
aur Nuh(alaihissalaam) ki khaum ka bhi is se pehle (yahi haal ho chuka tha), wo bhi bade na farmaan log thein
asmaan ko hum ne (apne) haatho se banaya hai aur yaqinan hum kushaadgi karne waale hai
aur zameen ko hum ne farsh bana diya hai, pas hum bahuth hee acche bichaane waale hai
aur har cheez ko hum ne joda joda payda kiya hai, ta ke tum nasihath haasil karo
pas tum Allah ki taraf daud bhaag (yaani rujo) karo, yaqinan main tumhe us ki taraf se saaf saaf tambi karne waala hoon
aur Allah ke saath kisi aur ko maboodh na tehraao, beshak main tumhe us ki taraf se khula daraane waala hoon
isi tarah jo log un se pehle guzre hai, un ke paas jo bhi rasool aya, unhone keh diya ke ya to ye jaadugar hai ya deewana hai
kya ye is baath ki ek dosre ko wasiyath karte gaye hai
(nahi) balke ye sab ke sab sarkash hai, to aap un se mu pher le,aap par koyi malaamath nahi
aur nasihath karte rahe, yaqinan ye nasihath imaan waalo ko nafa degi
main ne jinnaath aur insaano ko mahez isi liye payda kiya hai ke wo sirf meri ibaadath kare
na main un se rozi chahta hoon, na meri ye chaahath hai ke ye mujhe khilaaye
Allah ta’ala to khud hee sab ka rozi rasa, tawanaayi waala aur zoor aawar hai
pas jin logo ne zulm kiya hai, unhe bhi un ke saathiyo ke hisse ke misl, hissa milega, lehaza wo mujh se jaldi talab na kare
pas qaraabi hai munkiro ko un ke us din ki jis ka waada diye jaate hai
qasam hai toor ki
aur likhi hoyi kitaab ki
jo jhilli ke khule hoye warq mein hai
aur abaadh ghar ki
aur oonchi chath ki
aur bhad kaaye hoye samandar ki
beshak aap ke rab ka azaab ho kar rehne wala hai
ose koyi rokne waala nahi
jis din asmaan thar thraane lagega
aur pahaad chalne phirne lagenge
us din jhutlaane waalo ki (puri) qaraabi hai
jo apni be huda goyi mein uchal koodh kar rahe hai
jis din wo dhakke de de kar aatishe jahannam ki taraf laaye jayenge
yahi wo aatish dozakh hai jise tum jhoot batlaate thein
(ab bataao) kya ye jaadu hai? ya tum dekhte hee nahi ho
jaao dozakh mein ab tumhaara sabr karna aur na karna tumhaare liye yeksa hai, tumhe faqth tumhaare kiye ka badhla diya jayega
yaqinan parhezgaar log jannato mein aur nemato mein hai
jo unhe un ke rab ne de rakhi hai, us par khush khush hai aur un ke parvardigaar ne unhe jahannam ke azaab se bhi bacha liya hai
tum ma ze se khaate peete raho un amaal ke badhle jo tum karte thein
baraabar biche hoye shaandaar taqte par takye lagaaye hoye, aur hum ne un ke nikaah badi badi aankho waali (huro) se kar diye hai
aur jo log imaan laaye aur un ki aulaad ne bhi imaan mein un ki pairvi ki, hum un ki aulaad ko un tak pahonchaa denge aur un ke amal se hum kuch kam na karenge, har shaqs apne apne amaal ka girvi hai
hum un ke liye mewe aur marghoob gosht ki rel pel kar denge
(khush tabyi ke saath) ek dosre ke saath jaam (sharaab) ki china jhapti karenge, jis sharaab ke suroor mein be huda goyi hogi na gunah
aur un ke ird girdh un ke nau umr ghulaam chal phir rahe honge, goya ke wo moti thein, jo dhake rakhe thein
aur aapas mein ek dosre ki taraf mutawajjeh ho kar sawaal karenge
kahenge ke is se pehle hum ne apne ghar waalo ke darmiyaan bahuth dara karte thein
pas Allah ta’ala ne hum par bada ehsaan kiya aur hamein tez wa tundh garam hawaao ke azaab se bacha liya
hum us se pehle hee us ki ibaadath kiya karte thein, beshak wo mohsin aur meherbaan hai
to aap samjhaate rahe, kyo ke aap apne rab ke fazl se na to kaahin hai, na deewane
kya kaafir yo kehte hai ke, ye shaayar hai, hum is par zamaane ke hawaadis (yani mauth) ka intezaar kar rahe hai
keh dijiye! tum muntazir raho, main bhi tumhaare saath intezaar karne waalo mein hoon
kya un ki aqle unhe yahi sikhaati hai? ya ye log hee sarkash hai
kya ye kehte hai ke is Nabi ne (Qur’aan) khud ghad liya hai, waaqeya ye hai ke wo imaan nahi laate
accha agar ye sacche hai to bhala is jaisi ek (hee) baath ye (bhi) to le aaye
kya ye baghair kisi (paida karne waale) ke khud ba khud paida ho gaye hai, ya ye khud paida karne waale hai
kya un hone hee asmaano aur zameen ko paida kiya hai? balke ye yaqeen na karne waale log hai
ya kya un ke paas tere rab ke khazaane hai? ya (un khazaano ke) ye daarogha hai
ya kya un ke paas koyi sidi hai jis par chad kar sunte hai? (agar aisa hai) to un ka sunne waala koyi roushan daleel pesh kare
kya Allah ki to sab ladkiya hai aur tumhaare haan ladke hai
kya tu un se koyi ujrath talab karta hai ke ye is ke tawaan1 se bhujal ho rahe hai
kya un ke paas ilm e ghayb hai jise ye likh lete hai
kya ye log koyi fareb karna chahte hai? to yaqeen karle ke fareb khurda kaafir hee hai
kya Allah ke siva un ka koyi maboodh hai? (har giz nahi) Allah ta’ala un ke shirk se paak hai
agar ye log asmaan ke kisi tukde ko girta hoa dekh le, tabh bhi kehde ke ye tay ba tay baadal hai
tu unhe chohd de, yahaa tak ke unhe us din se saabeqa pade, jis mein ye be hoosh kar diye jayenge
jis din unhe un ka makr kuch kaam na dega aur na wo madad kiye jayenge
beshak zaalimo ke liye is ke alaawa aur azaab bhi hai, lekin un logo mein se aksar be ilm hai
to apne rab ke hukm ke intezaar mein sabr se kaam le, beshak tu hamaari aankho ke saamne hai, subah ko jab tu uthe, apne rab ki paaki aur hamdh bayaan kar
aur raath ko bhi us ki tasbih pad aur sitaaro ke doobte waqth bhi
qasam hai sitaare ki jab wo gire
ke tumhaare saathi ne, na raah gom ki hai, na wo tedi raah par hai
aur na wo apni qaahish se koyi baath kehte hai
wo to sirf wahi hai, jo utaari jaati hai
ose puri taaqath waale farishte ne sikhaaya hai
jo zoor aawar hai, phir wo sidha khada ho gaya
aur wo bulandh asmaan ke kinaaro par tha
phir nazdeek hoa aur utar ayaa
pas wo do kamaano ke ba-qadr faasla reh gaya balke us se bhi kam
pas us ne Allah ke bandhe ko wahi pahonchaayi, jo bhi pahonchaayi
dil ne jhoot nahi kaha, jise (payghambar ne dekha)
kya tum jhagda karte ho, us par jo (payghambar) dekhte hai
ose to ek martaba aur bhi dekha tha
sidratul muntaha ke paas
osi ke paas jannatul maawa hai
jab ke sidrah ko chupaaye leti thi, wo cheez jo us par chaa rahi thi
na to nigaah behki na hadh se badi
yaqinan us ne apne rab ki badi badi nishaaniyo mein se baaz nishaaniya dekh li
kya tum ne laath aur uzza ko dekha
aur manaath tisre pichle ko
kya tumhaare liye ladke aur Allah ke liye ladkiya hai
ye to badi be insaafi ki taqseem hai

dar asal ye sirf naam hai, jo tum ne aur tumhaare baap dadaao ne, un ke rakh liye hai, Allah ne un ki koyi daleel nahi utaari, ye log to sirf atkal ke aur apni nafsaani qaahisho ke piche pade hoye hai aur yaqinan un ke rab ki taraf se un ke paas hidaayath aa chuki hai
kya har shaqs jo aarzo kare ose mayassar hai
Allah hee ke haath hai ye jahaan aur wo jahaan
aur bahuth se farishte asmaano mein hai, jin ki sifaarish kuch bhi nafa nahi de sakti magar ye aur baath hai ke Allah ta’ala apni khushi aur apni chaahath se jis ke liye chaahe ijaazath de de
beshak jo log aaqirath par imaan nahi rakhte, wo farishto ka zanaana naam muqarrar karte hai
halaan ke unhe us ka koyi ilm nahi, wo sirf apne gumaan ke piche pade hoye hai aur beshak wehem (wa gumaan) haq ke muqaable mein kuch kaam nahi deta
to aap us se mu mod le, jo hamaari yaad se mu mode, aur jin ka iraada bajuz zindagaaniye dunya ke aur kuch na ho
yahi un ke ilm ki inteha hai, aap ka rab us se qoob waaqif hai jo us ki raah se bhatak gaya hai aur wahi qoob waafiq hai us se bhi jo raahe yaafta hai

aur Allah hee ka hai jo kuch asmaano mein hai aur jo kuch zameen mein hai, ta ke Allah ta’ala bure amal karne waalo ko un ke amaal ka badhla de aur nek kaam karne waalo ko accha badhla inaayath farmaaye

un logo ko jo bade gunaaho se bachte hai aur be hayaayi se bhi, sivaaye kisi chote se gunaah ke, beshak tera rab bahuth kushaada maghfirath waala hai, wo tumhe ba qoobi jaanta hai, jab ke us ne tumhe zameen se payda kiya aur jab ke tum apni maao ke pet mein bacche thein, pas tum apni paakizgi aap bayaan na karo, wahi parhezgaaro ko qoob jaanta hai
kya aap ne ose dekha jis ne mu mod liya
aur bahuth kam diya aur haath rok liya
kya ose ilm e ghayb hai ke wo (sab kuch) dekh raha hai
kya ose us cheez ki qabar nahi di gayi jo Mosa (alaihissalaam) ke
aur wafadaar Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) ke sahifo mein tha
ke koyi shaqs kisi dosre ka boojh na uthaayega
aur ye ke har insaan ke liye sirf wahi hai jis ki koshish khud us ne ki
aur ye ke beshak us ki koshish an qareeb dekhi jayegi
phir ose pura pura badhla diya jayega
aur ye ke aap ke rab hee ki taraf pahonchna hai
aur ye ke wahi hasaata hai aur wahi rulaata hai
aur ye ke wahi maarta hai aur jilaata hai
aur ye ke osi ne joda yaani nar wa maada payda kiya hai
nutfe se jab ke wo tapkaaya jaata hai
aur ye ke osi ke zimme dobaara payda karna hai
aur ye ke wahi maaldaar banaata hai aur sarmaaya deta hai
aur ye ke wahi shira (sitaare) ka rab hai
aur ye ke osi ne aadh awwal ko halaak kiya hai
aur samoodh ko bhi (jin mein se) ek ko bhi baaqi na rakha
aur us se pehle khaum nuh ko, yaqinan wo bade zaalim aur sarkash thein
aur mu-taafiqa (shahar ya ulti hoyi bastiyo ko) osi ne ulat diya
phir us par cha diya jo chaya
pas aye insaan tu apne rab ki kis kis nemath ke baare mein jhagdega
ye (Nabi) daraane waale hai, pehle daraane waalo mein se
aane waali ghadi qareeb aa gayi hai
Allah ke siva us ka (waqte mu’ayyan par khol) dikhaane waala aur koyi nahi
pas kya tum us baath se ta’ajjub karte ho
aur has rahe ho? rote nahi
(balke) tum khel rahe ho
ab Allah ke saamne sajde karo aur (osi ki) ibaadath karo
qayaamath qareeb aa gayi aur chaandh phat gaya
ye agar koyi maujiza dekhte hai, to mu pher lete hai aur keh dete hai ke ye pehle se chala ataa hoa jaadu hai
unhone jhutlaaya aur apni qaahisho ki pairvi ki aur har kaam tehre hoye waqt par muqarrar hai
yaqinan in ke paas wo qabre aa chuki hai jin mein daant dapat (ki nasihath) hai
aur kaamil aqal ki baath hai, lekin un darauni baatho ne bhi kuch fayda na diya
pas (aye Nabi) tum un se eraaz karo, jis din ek pukaarne waala na gawaar cheez ki taraf pukarega
ye jhuki aankho, qabro se is tarah nikal khade honge, ke goya wo phayla hoa taddi dil hai
pukaarne waale ki taraf daudte honge aur kaafir kahenge, ye din to bahuth saqth hai
un se pehle khaum nuh ne bhi hamaare bandhe ko jhutlaaya tha aur deewana batla kar jhidak diya gaya tha
pas us ne apne rab se dua ki, ke main be bas hoon, tu meri madad kar
pas hum ne asmaan ke darwaazo ko zor ke meh se khol diya
aur zameen se chashmo ko jaari kar diya, pas us kaam ke liye jo muqaddar kiya gaya tha, (duno) paani jama ho gaye
aur hum ne ise taqto aur keelo waali (kashti) par sawaar kar liya
jo hamaari aankho ke saamne chal rahi thi, badhla us ki taraf se jis ka kufr kiya gaya tha
aur beshak hum ne is waaqe ko nishaani bana kar baaqi rakha, pas koyi hai nasihath haasil karne waala
bataao mera azaab aur meri daraane waali batein kaisi rahi
aur beshak hum ne Qur’aan ko samajhne ke liye asaan kar diya hai, pas kya koyi nasihath haasil karne waala hai
khaume aadh ne bhi jhutlaaya, pas kaisa hoa mera azaab aur meri daraane waali batein
hum ne un par tez wa tundh musal sil chalne waali hawa, ek paiham man’hoos din mein bhej di
jo logo ko utha utha kar de patakti thi, goya ke wo jad se kate hoye khajoor ke ta’ne hai
pas kaisi rahi meri saza aur mere daraana
yaqinan hum ne Qur’aan ko nasihath ke liye asaan kar diya hai, pas kya hai koyi nasihath haasil karne waala
khaum samoodh ne daraane waalo ko jhutlaaya
aur kehne lage, kya hum hee mein se ek shaqs ki hum farmabardaari karne lage? tab to hum yaqinan ghalti aur deewaangi mein pade hoye honge
kya hamaare sab ke darmiyaan sirf isi par wahi utaari gayi? nahi balke wo jhuta sheqi qoor hai
ab sab jaan lenge kal ko, ke kaun jhuta aur sheqi qoor tha
beshak hum un ki azmaayesh ke liye ontni bhejenge, pas (aye saaleh) tu un ka muntazir reh aur sabr kar

beshak ye Allah azmath waale par imaan na rakhta tha
aur miskeen ke khilaane par raghbath na dilaata tha
pas aaj us ka na koyi dosth hai
aur na sivaaye peep ke us ki koyi ghiza hai
jise gunahgaaro ke siva koyi nahi khayega
pas mujhe qasam hai un chizo ki jinhe tum dekhte ho
aur un chizo ki jinhe tum nahi dekhte
ke beshak ye Qur’aan buzrug rasool ka khaul hai
ye kisi shaayar ka khaul nahi (afsoos) tumhe bahuth kam yaqeen hai
aur na kisi kaahin ka khaul hai(afsoos) bahuth kam nasihath le rahe ho
(ye to) rabbul aalameen ka utaara hoa hai
aur agar ye hum par koyi bhi baath bana leta
to albatta hum us ka dahna haath pakad lete
phir us ki shay rag kaat dete
phir tum mein se koyi bhi mujhe us se rokne waala na hota
yaqinan ye Qur’aan parhezgaaro ke liye nasihath hai
hamein puri tarah maloom hai ke tum mein se baaz us ke jhutlaane waale hai
beshak (ye jhutlaana) kaafiro par hasrath hai
aur beshak (wa shuba) ye yaqini haq hai
pas tu apne rab azeem ki paaki bayaan kar
ek sawaal karne waale ne us azaab ka sawaal kiya, jo waazeh hone waala hai
kaafiro par jise koyi hataane waala nahi
us Allah ki taraf se jo sidiyo waala hai
jis ki taraf farishte aur ruh chadte hai, ek din mein jis ki meqdaar pachaas hazaar saal ki hai
pas tu acchi tarah sabr kar
beshak ye us (azaab) ko door samajh rahe hai
aur hum ose qareeb dekhte hai
jis din asmaan misl tel ki til chat ke ho jayega
aur pahaad misl rangeen oon ke ho jayenge
aur koyi dosth kisi dosth ko na pochega
(halaan ke) ek dosre ko dikha diye jayenge, gunahgaar us din ke azaab ke badhle fidye mein apne beto ko
apni biwi ko aur apne bhai ko
aur apne kumbe ko jo ose panaah deta tha
aur roye zameen ke sab logo ko dena chahega, ta ke ye ise najaath dila de
(magar) har giz ye na hoga, yaqinan wo shole waali (aag) hai
jo mu aur sar ki khaal khinch laane waali hai
wo har us shaqs ko pukaaregi jo piche hat ta aur mu modta hai
aur jama kar ke sambhaal rakhta hai
beshak insaan bade kacche dil waala banaya gaya hai
jab ose musibath pahonchti hai to had bada uthta hai
aur jab raahath milti hai to buql karne lagta hai
magar wo namaazi
jo apni namaaz par hameshgi karne waale hai
aur jin ke maalo mein muqarrara hissa hai
maangne waalo ka bhi aur sawaal se bachne waalo ka bhi
aur jo insaaf ke din par yaqeen rakhte hai
aur jo apne rab ke azaab se darte rehte hai
beshak un ke rab ka azaab be khauf hone ki cheez nahi
aur jo log apni sharam-gaaho ki (haraam se) hifaazath karte hai
haan un ki biwiyo aur laundiyo ke baare mein, jin ke wo maalik hai, unhe koyi malaamath nahi
ab jo koyi us ke alaawa (raah) dhundega to aise log hadh se guzar jaane waale honge
aur jo apni amaanato ka aur apne khaul wa qaraar ka paas rakhte hai
aur jo apni gawaahiyo par sidhe aur qaayam rehte hai
aur jo apni namaazo ki hifaazath karte hai
yahi log jannato mein izzath waale honge
pas kaafiro ko kya ho gaya hai ke wo teri taraf daudte aate hai
daaye aur baaye se gruh ke gruh
kya un mein se har ek ki tawaqqe ye hai ke wo nemato waali jannath mein daakhil kiya jayega
(aisa) har giz na hoga, hum ne unhe us cheez se payda kiya hai jise wo jaante hai
pas mujhe qasam hai mashriqo aur maghribo ke rab ki, (ke) hum yaqinan qaadir hai
us par ke us ke ewaz, un se acche log le aaye, aur hum aajiz nahi hai
pas tu unhe jhagadta khelta chohd de, yahaa tak ke ye apne us din se ja mile, jis ka un se waada kiya jaata hai
jis din ye qabro se daudte hoye niklenge, goya ke wo kisi jageh ki taraf tez tez ja rahe hai
un ki aankhe jhuki hoyi hogi, un par zillath cha rahi hogi, ye hai wo din jis ka un se waada kiya jaata tha
yaqinan hum ne Nuh(alaihissalaam) ko un ki khaum ki taraf bheja ke apni khaum ko dara do (aur qabardaar kardo) us se pehle ke un ke paas dardnaak azaab aa jaaye
Nuh(alaihissalaam) ne ) kaha aye meri khaum! main tumhe saaf saaf daraane waala hoon
ke tum Allah ki ibaadath karo aur osi se daro aur mera kaha maano
to wo tumhaare gunaah baqsh dega aur tumhe ek waqth muqarrara tak chohd dega, yaqinan Allah ka waada jab aa jaata hai to mu’aqqar nahi hota, kaash ke tumhe samajh hoti
Nuh (alaihissalaam) ne) kaha aye mere parvardigaar! main ne apni khaum ko raath din teri taraf bulaaya hai
magar mere bulaane se ye log aur zyaada bhaagne lage
main ne jab kabhi unhe teri baqshish ke liye bulaaya, unhone apni ongliya apne kaano mein daal li aur apne kapdo ko od liya aur ad gaye aur bada takabbur kiya
phir main ne unhe ba-awaaz bulandh bulaaya
aur beshak main ne un se elaaniya bhi kaha aur chupke chupke bhi
aur main ne kaha ke apne rab se apne gunaah baqsh waao (aur maafi maango) wo yaqinan bada baqshne waala hai
wo tum par asmaan ko qoob barasta hoa chohd dega
aur tumhe qoob pay dar pay maal aur aulaad mein taraqqi dega aur tumhe baghaath dega aur tumhaare liye nehre nikaal dega
tumhe kya ho gaya hai ke tum Allah ki bartari ka aqeeda nahi rakhte
halaan ke us ne tumhe tarah tarah se payda kiya hai
kya tum nahi dekhte ke Allah ta’ala ne upar ta-le kis tarah saath asmaan payda kar diye hai
aur un mein chaandh ko qoob jagmagata banaya hai aur suraj ko roushan chiraagh banaya hai
aur tum ko zameen se ek (qaas ehtemaam se) ugaaaya hai (aur payda kiya hai)
phir tumhe osi mein lauta le jayega aur (ek qaas tariqe) se phir nikaalega
aur tumhaare liye zameen ko Allah ta’ala ne farsh bana diya hai
ta ke tum us ki kushaada raaho mein chalo phiro
Nuh(alaihissalaam)) ne kaha aye mere parvardigaar! un logo ne meri to na-farmaani ki aur aiso ki farmabardaari ki, jin ke maal wa aulaad ne un ko (yaqinan) nuqsaan hee mein badaaya hai
aur un logo ne bada saqth fareb kiya
aur kaha unhone ke har giz apne mabudho ko na chohd na aur na wadh aur sava aur yaghoos aur ya’ooq aur nasr ko chohd na
aur unhone bahuth se logo ko gumraah kiya (ilaahi) tu un zaalimo ki gumraahi aur bada
ye log ba sabab apne gunaaho ke dubo diye gaye aur jahannam mein pahoncha diye gaye aur Allah ke siva apna koyi madadgaar unhone na paaya
aur (hazrath) Nuh(alaihissalaam) ne kaha ke aye mere paalne waale! tu roye zameen par kisi kaafir ko rehne sehne waale na chohd
agar tu unhe chohd dega to (yaqinan) ye tere aur bandho ko (bhi) gumraah kar denge aur ye faajiro aur dheet kaafiro hee ko janam denge

aye mere parvardigaar! tu mujhe aur mere maa baap aur jo imaan ki haalath mein mere ghar mein aaye aur tamaam momin mardo aur aurto ko baqsh de aur kaafiro ko sivaaye barbaadhi ke, aur kisi baath mein na bada
aye Muhammad(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) aap kehde ke mujhe wahi ki gayi hai ke jino ki ek jamaath ne (Qur’aan) suna aur kaha ke hum ne ajeeb Qur’aan suna hai
jo raahe raasth ki taraf rehnumaayi karta hai, hum us par imaan laa chuke (ab) hum har giz kisi ko bhi apne rab ka shareek na banayenge
aur beshak hamaare rab ki shaan badi bulndh hai, na us ne kisi ko (apni) biwi banaaya hai na beta
aur ye ke hum mein ka be waqoof Allah ke baare mein qilaafe haq batein kaha karta tha
aur hum to yahi samjhte rahe ke na mumkin hai ke insaan aur jinaath Allah par jhoti baatein lagaaye
baath ye hai ke chandh insaan baaz jinnaath se panaah talab kiya karte thein, jis se jinnaath apni sarkashi mein aur bad gaye
aur (insaano) ne bhi tum jino ki tarah gumaan kar liya tha ke Allah kisi ko na bhejega (ya kisi ko dobara zinda na karega)
aur hum ne asmaan ko tatool kar dekha to ose saqth chaukidaaro aur saqth shulo se pur paaya
us se pehle hum batein sunne ke liye asmaan mein jageh jageh baith jaaya karte thein, ab jo bhi kaan lagaata hai, wo ek shole ko apni taak mein paata hai
hum nahi jaante ke zameen waalo ke saath kisi buraayi ka iraada kiya gaya hai ya un ke rab ka iraada un ke saath bhalaayi ka hai
aur ye ke (beshak) baaz to hum mein neko kaar hai aur baaz us ke bar aks bhi hai, hum muqtalif tariqo se bate hoye hai
aur hum ne samajh liya ke hum Allah ta’ala ko zameen mein har giz aajiz nahi kar sakte aur na hum bhaag kar ose hara sakte hai
hum to hidaayath ki baath sunte hee us par imaan laa chuke aur jo bhi apne rab par imaan layega, ose na kisi nuqsaan ka andesha hai, na zulm wa sitam ka
haan hum mein baaz to musalmaan hai aur baaz be insaaf hai, pas jo farmabardaar ho gaye, unhone to raahe raasth ka qasdh kiya
aur jo zaalim hai, wo jahannam ka indhan ban gaye
aur (aye Nabi(sallalahu alaihi wasallam) ye bhi keh do) ke agar log raahe raasth par sidhe rehte to, yaqinan hum unhe bahuth waafer paani pilaate
ta ke hum us mein unhe azmaale aur jo shaqs apne parvardigaar ke zikr se mu pher lega, to Allah ta’ala ose saqth azaab mein mubtela kar dega
aur ye ke masjide sirf Allah hee ke liye qaas hai, pas Allah ta’ala ke saath kisi aur ko na pukaaro
aur jab Allah ka bandha us ki ibaadath ke liye khada hoa to qareeb tha ke wo bheed ki bheed ban kar us par pil pade
aap keh dijiye ke main to sirf apne rab hee ko pukaarta hoon aur us ke saath kisi ko shareek nahi karta
keh dijiye ke mujhe tumhaare kisi nuqsaan, na-fe ka eqtiyaar nahi
keh dijiye ke mujhe har giz koyi Allah se bacha nahi sakta aur main har giz us ke siva koyi jaaye panaah bhi pa nahi sakta

albatta (mera kaam) Allah ki baath aur us ke paighamaath (logo ko) pahoncha dena hai, (ab) jo bhi Allah aur us ke rasool ki na manega, us ke liye jahannam ki aag hai, jis mein aise log hamesha rahenge
(un ki aankh na khulegi) yahaa tak ke ose dekh le jis ka un ko waada diya jaata hai, pas an qareeb jaan lenge ke kis ka madadgaar kamzoor aur kis ki jamaath kam hai
keh dijiye ke mujhe maloom nahi ke jis ka waada tum se kiya jaata hai, wo qareeb hai ya mera rab us ke liye door ki muddath muqarrar karega
wo ghayb ka jaanne waala hai aur apne ghayb par kisi ko mutthala nahi karta
sivaaye us paighambar ke jise wo pasand karle, lekin us ke bhi aage piche pehre daar muqarrar kar deta hai
ta ke un ke apne rab ke paighaam pahoncha dene ka ilm ho jaaye, Allah ta’ala ne un ke aas paas (ki tamaam chizo) ka ahaata kar rakha hai aur har cheez ki ginti ka shumaar kar rakha hai
aye kapde mein lipatne waale
raath (ke waqt namaaz) mein khade ho jaao magar kam
aadhi raath ya us se bhi kuch kam karle
ya us par badha de aur Qur’aan ko teher teher kar (saaf) padha kar
yaqinan hum tujh par bahuth bhaari baath an qareen naazil karenge
beshak raath ka uthna dil jamyi ke liye intehaayi munaasib hai aur baath ko bahuth durusth kar dene waala hai
yaqinan tujhe din mein bahuth shughal rehta hai
tu apne rab ke naam ka zikr kiya kar aur tamaam qalaayeq se kat kar us ki taraf mutawajjeh ho ja
mashriq wa maghrib ka parvardigaar, jis ke siva koyi maboodh nahi, tu osi ko apna kaar-saaz bana le
aur jo kuch wo kahe, tu sehta reh aur wafa daari ke saath un se alag thalag reh
aur mujhe un jhutlaane waale aasoda haal logo ko chohd de aur unhe zara si muhullath de
yaqinan hamaare haan saqth bediyaa hai aur sulagti hoyi jahannam hai
aur halaq mein atakne waala khaana hai aur dard dene waala azaab hai
jis din zameen aur pahaad thar thara jayenge aur pahaad misl bhar bhari reth ke tilo ke ho jayenge
beshak hum ne tumhaari taraf bhi, tum par gawaahi dene waala rasool bhej diya hai, jaise ke hum ne feraun ke paas rasool bheja tha
to feraun ne us rasool ki na-farmaani ki, to hum ne ose saqth (wabaal ki) pakad mein pakad liya
tum agar kaafir rahe to, us din kaise panaah paoge jo din baccho ko buda kar dega
jis din asmaan phat jayega, Allah ta’ala ka ye waada ho kar hee rehne waala hai
beshak ye nasihath hai, pas jo chaahe apne rab ki taraf raah eqtiyaar kare

aap ka rab ba-qoobi jaanta hai ke, aap aur aap ke saath ke logo ki, ek jamaath qareeb do tihaayi raath ke aur aadhi raath ke aur ek tihaayi raath ke tahajjud padti hai aur raath din ka pura andaaza Allah ta’ala ko hee hai, wo (qoob) jaanta hai ke tum ose hargiz na nibha sakoge, pas us ne tum par meherbaani ki, lehaaza jitna Qur’aan padna tumhaare liye asaan ho, utna hee pado, wo jaanta hai ke tum mein baaz bimaar bhi honge, baaz zameen mein chal phir kar Allah ta’ala ka fazl (yani rozi bhi) talaash karenge, aur kuch log Allah ta’ala ki raah mein jihaad bhi karenge, so tum ba-asaani jitna Qur’aan pad sako padho aur namaaz ki paabandi rakho aur zakaath dete raha karo aur Allah ta’ala ko accha qarz do aur jo neki tum apne liye aage bhejoge, ose Allah ta’ala ke haan behtar se behtar aur sawaab mein bahuth zyaada paoge, Allah ta’ala se maafi maangte raho, yaqinan Allah ta’ala baqshne waala meherbaan hai

hum ne dozakh ke daaroghe sirf farishte rakhe hai aur hum ne un ki tedaadh sirf kaafiro ki azmaayesh ke liye muqarrar ki hai, ta ke ahle kitaab yaqeen karle aur ahle imaan ke imaan mein izaafa ho jaaye aur ahle kitaab aur ahle imaan shak na kare aur jin ke dilo mein bimaari hai, wo aur kaafir kahe ke is bayaan se Allah ta’ala ki kya muraad hai? isi tarah Allah ta’ala jise chaahta hai gumraah karta hai aur jise chaahta hai hidaayath deta hai, tere rab ke lashkaro ko us ke siva koyi nahi jaanta, ye tawakkal bani aadam ke liye saraasar pandh wa nasihath hai
sach kehta hoon, qasam hai chaandh ki

bani aadam ko daraane waali

magar daaye haath waale

sawaal karte honge

ab jo chaahe is se nasihath haasil kare
aur wo us waqt nasihath haasil karenge, jab Allah ta’ala chaahe, wo osi laayeq hai ke us se dare aur us laayeq bhi ke wo baqshe
main qasam khaata hoon qayaamath ke din ki
aur qasam khaata hoon us nafs ki jo malaamath karne waala ho
kya insaan ye qayaal karta hai ke hum us ki haddiyaa jama karenge hee nahi
haan zaroor karenge, hum to qaadir hai, ke us ki por por tak durusth karde
balke insaan to chahta hai ke aage aage na farmaaniya karta jaaye
pochta hai ke qayaamath ka din kab aayega
pas jis waqth ke nigaah pathra jayegi
aur chaandh be-noor ho jayega
aur suraj aur chaandh jama kar diye jayenge
us din insaan kahega ke aaj bhaagne ki jagah kahaa hai
nahi nahi koyi panaah gaah nahi
aaj to tere parvardigaar ki taraf hee qaraar gaah hai
aaj insaan ko us ke aage bheje hoye aur piche chohde hoye se agaah kiya jayega
balke insaan khud apne upar aap hujjath hai
agar che kitne hee bahaane pesh kare
ye Nabi(sallallahu alaihi wasallam) aap Qur’aan ko jaldi (yaad karne) ke liye apni zabaan ko harkath na de
us ka jama karna aur (aap ki zabaan se) padna hamaare zimme hai
hum jab ise padle to aap us ke padne ki pairvi kare
phir us ka waazeh kar dena hamaare zimme hai
nahi nahi, tum jaldi milne waali (dunya) ki muhabbath rakhte ho
aur aaqirath ko chohd baithe ho
us roz bahuth se chehre taro taaza aur ba-raunaq honge
apne rab ki taraf dekhte honge
aur kitne chehre us din (badh raunaq aur) udaas honge
samjhte honge ke un ke saath kamar tod dene waala maamla kiya jayega
nahi nahi, jab ruh hansali1 tak pahonchegi
aur kaha jayega ke koyi jhaad phok karne waala hai
aur jaan liya us ne ke ye waqte judaayi hai
aur pindli se pindli lipat jayegi
aaj tere parvardigaar ki taraf chalna hai
us ne na to tasdeeq ki na namaaz adaa ki
balke jhutlaaya aur ru-gardaani ki
phir apne ghar waalo ke paas itraata hoa gaya
afsoos hai tujh par hasrath hai tujh par
waay hai aur qaraabi hai tere liye
kya insaan ye samajhta hai ke ose bekaar chohd diya jayega
kya wo ek gaade paani ka qatra na tha, jo tapkaya gaya tha
phir wo laho ka lothda ho gaya, phir Allah ne ose payda kiya aur durusth banaya
phir us se jode yaani nar wa mada banaaye
kya (Allah ta’ala) us amr par qaadir nahi ke murde ko zinda karde
yaqinan guzra hai insaan par ek waqth zamaane mein, jab ke ye koyi qaabile zikr cheez na tha
beshak hum ne insaan ko mile jhule natfe se imtehaan ke liye payda kiya aur us ko sunta dekhta banaya
hum ne ose raah dikhaayi, ab qaah wo shukr guzaar bane, qaah na shukra
yaqinan hum ne kaafiro ke liye zanjire aur tauq aur shulo waali aag tayyaar kar rakhi hai
beshak nek log wo jaam piyenge jis ki aamizash kaafoor ki hai
jo ek chashma hai, jis se Allah ke bandhe piyenge, us ki nehre nikaal le jayenge (jidhar chaahe)
jo nazar puri karte hai aur us din se darte hai jis ki buraayi chaaro taraf phail jaane waali hai
aur Allah ta’ala ki muhabbath mein khaana khilaate hai, miskeen, yateem aur khaidiyo ko
hum to tumhe sirf Allah ta’ala ki raza mandhi ke liye khilaate hai, na tum se badhla chaahte hai, na shukr guzaari
beshak hum apne parvardigaar se us din ka khauf karte hai, jo udaasi aur saqti waala hoga
pas unhe Allah ta’ala ne us din ki buraayi se bacha liya aur unhe taazgi aur khushi pahonchaayi
aur unhe un ke sabr ke badhle jannath aur reshmi libaas ataa farmaaye
ye wahaan taqto par takye lagaaye hoye baithenge, na wahaa aftaab ki garmi dekhenge, na jaade ki saqti
un jannato ke saaye un par jhuke hoye honge aur un ke (mewe aur) gucche niche latkaaye hoye honge
aur un par chaandi ke bartano aur jaamo ka daur karaaya jayega jo shishe ke honge
shishe bhi chaandi ke jin ko (saaqi ne) andaaze se naap rakha hoga
aur unhe wahaa wo jaam pilaaye jayenge, jin ki aamizash zanjabeel1 ki hogi
jannath ki ek neher se jis ka naam sal sabeel hai
aur un ke ird gird ghumte phirte honge, wo kamsin bacche jo hamesha rehne waale hai, jab tu unhe dekhe to samjhe ke wo bikhre hoye sacche moti hai
tu wahaa jahaan kahi bhi nazar daalega saraasar nemate aur azeemo shaan saltanath bhi dekhega
un ke jismo par sabz baareek aur mote reshmi kapde honge aur unhe chaandi ke kangan ka zewar pehnaaya jayega aur unhe un ka rab paak saaf sharaab pilaayega
(kaha jayega) ke ye hai tumhaare amaal ka badhla aur tumhaari koshish ki qadar ki gayi hai
beshak hum ne tujh par ba-tadhreej Qur’aan naazil kiya hai
pas tu apne rab ke hukm par qaayam reh aur un mein se kisi gunehgaar ya na shukre ka kaha na maan
aur apne rab ke naam ka subaah wa shaam zikr kiya kar
